332207.「私の方では 異界の闘技場の 調査課題を\n まとめさせていただいています。\n:
Currently, I'm compiling various research tasks for the Otherworld Arena.
As you complete them, you will be rewarded with any items we've come across, so be sure to let us know when you find anything!
The tasks will be updated each month. Please note that you may only receive a reward from a task once.
Also, if the tasks update before you're able to claim any rewards from previous tasks completed, there's no need to worry.
You'll still be able to receive them.

332208.「それでは引き続き 調査へのご協力\n お願いします！: Please continue to aid in our investigation!

332209.「おや？ <pc>さん\n まだ 受け取っていない\n 調査報酬が あるみたいで:
What's this? It appears you have a reward that I haven't given to you yet.
Please come back after you've organized your belongings so I can give it to you!

332210.「今 お渡しした 天啓の石について\n 説明させていただきますね。\n<br>\:
Allow me to explain about the Supreme Stone I just gave you.
It's a stone we found in this world, and it's quite powerful.
looked at it, and we discovered it is much like the Heart Crystal, having a relation to your manifested
companions.
There's a good chance it will be able to increase their level as well as their bond towards you, so please give it to them!
If you need this explained again, then can explain it.

332222.「それでは 少し整理してから\n また いらしてください！:
Please come back after you've done some
reorganizing!
